FuncDef: This command configures hold-down timers to debounce signal failure conditions (lais, b2err-sf) and signal degrade conditions (b2err-sd) for Uni 1+1 Sig+Data APS switching mode (switching mode uni-1plus1).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer to define the signal failure hold-down time in milliseconds. Values-1 to 100.
Specifies an integer to define the signal degrade hold-down time in milliseconds. Values-1 to 100.
